title: Clock
description: Initial settings for a simulated clock when a document is loaded. The start and stop time are configured using the interval property.

currentTime.description: The current time, specified in ISO8601 format.

multiplier.description: The multiplier. When `step` is set to `TICK_DEPENDENT`, this is the number of seconds to advance each tick. When `step` is set to `SYSTEM_CLOCK_DEPENDENT`, this is multiplied by the elapsed system time between ticks. This value is ignored in `SYSTEM_CLOCK` mode.

range.description: The behavior when the current time reaches its start or end times.

step.description: How the current time advances each tick.
